Material.Name: material
Material.Components: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

Spell.Name: Steel Wind Strike
Spell.Description: You flourish the weapon used in the casting and then vanish to strike like the wind. Choose up to five creatures you can see within range. Make a melee spell attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes 6d10 force damage. You can then teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 5 feet of one of the targets you hit or missed.
